CROSSBLADE.Layers.Name: Crossblade Sound Layers
CROSSBLADE.Layers.Help:
Configure sound layers that will be faded in instead of the main audio source in response to specific events.
For all events that do not have a sound layer configured here, Crossblade will default to fading in the main audio source instead.
You can also configure a layer using the same file as the main audio source here if you want it to fade in for specific events.
